question:
Consider the following countries:
1. Equatorial Guinea
2. Democratic Republic of Congo 
3. Gabon
Which among the following is a common statement about all of the three countries?
option1: All of the above countries lie on equator
option2: All of the above countries share border with Atlantic Ocean
option3: All of above are landlocked countries
option4: All of above have the highest per capita GDP among African Countries
answer: All of the above countries share border with Atlantic Ocean
explanation: Equatorial Guinea, Congo and Gabon share border with Atlantic ocean. They lie above the equator. Equator doesn’t pass through Equatorial Guinea.
